location.inputMessage: Enter location (ex.,eastus2), if you leave empty location will be default to eastus2

resourceGroupName.inputMessage: Enter resource group name, leave empty if you want to create a resource group as App name

storageAccountName.inputMessage: Enter StorageAccount name, leave empty if you want to create a Storage Account as App name

keyVaultName.inputMessage: Enter KeyVault name, leave empty if you want to create a key vault as App name

aadAppName.inputMessage: Enter AAD App name, leave empty if you want to create a aadApp as App name

localAppDirectory.inputMessage: Enter Local App Directory, leave empty if you want to upload the files later

customEmails.inputMessage: Enter email address to set alert notification, leave empty if you do not want to set alert notification

pfxFile.inputMessage: Enter full path to pfx file to configure app gateway secure frontend

backendHostName.inputMessage: Enter fqdn for the web app backend pool(ex., prod.onakumina.com)

vnetAddressPrefix.inputMessage: Address prefix for the Virtual Network(ex., 10.100.0.0/16)

redisCacheName.inputMessage: Enter Redis Service name, leave empty if you want to create a Redis Service as App name

akQueryKey.inputMessage: Enter App QueryKey to create Content Distribution app

akAppManagerUrl.inputMessage: Enter App ManagerUrl to create Content Distribution app

distributionAppDirectory.inputMessage: Enter Local Content Distribution App Directory, leave empty if you want to upload the files later
